creator: jan.grant@bristol.ac.uk
text:
Multiple platforms (tried on Win32 and it fails there too)

I've subclassed BaseInterceptor and overridden engineInit and engineShutdown
methods in order to do resource management. The engineInit method is called on
startup (can tell, since I write info to System.err) - however, the
engineShutdown method doesn't seem to be invoked.
This is a huge problem since I'm relying on this to leave a database in a
consistent state.
